website_summaries.verdict: A good, medium-priced dartboard from a reputable company. It's durable and good for professional or recreational players.
pros: Features self-repairing sisal and is 18 inches in diameter (regulation tournament size)
It's a durable board, and has a staple-free bull's-eye, as well as thin wires to prevent bounce-outs
cons: Some reports that divider grill may start protruding through sisal, and repair is difficult

customer_reviews.title: Would like to post a pic of it
customer_reviews.text: This dart board is a joke. There is no healing at all. Might as well be throwing at drywall. Would like to post a pic of it. I have a 50 year old board that has instant recovery. The only downfall is the thick wire and staples. This board will push darts out. Only board I've ever played on that you can stick a dart and as you are walking up to pull your dart it falls out. Where can I get a real board ? I only have it one star so I could post.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: i think i got a bad board! All in all the board isn't that ...
customer_reviews.text: i think i got a bad board! All in all the board isn't that bad but on this board the divider rings are not centered, some are folded over and the color in each divider was crossed over into the other. i feel this board was very poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: John Viszlay

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this board rather than spending a little more for the Winmau Blade 4/5... BIG MISTAKE! THIS GLD BOARD IS DEFECTIVE! The double bull is not placed in the center of the board... red bull not centered within the green bull. And its not off by just a little bit... ITS WAY OFF. So much that its easy to see from the toe line 7 feet away. My advice... spend the extra $10 and buy the Winmau.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Rook

customer_reviews.title: It appears to be old or out dated stock. ...
customer_reviews.text: It appears to be old or out dated stock. The darts fall out of the board often. I have been playing darts for 29 years and play in competitions. I have previously owned this board with no complaints .
customer_reviews.author: BnNorm

customer_reviews.title: This board has been wonderful as far as rejecting bounce outs
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new board for work, yes work. I'm an I.T. administrator and getting out of my chair is essential ;-) Our old board had thick wires that continuously created bounce outs. This board has been wonderful as far as rejecting bounce outs. The description states it is self healing. That seems to be the case, although when pulling the darts out you can see the hole it created. Once another dart enters the board this hole disappears. Overall this is a great board. Not as good as the old fashion horse hair boards but very similar. I recommend this board to whomever likes to play darts.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel LaRue

customer_reviews.title: best darn board I have owned
customer_reviews.text: This is a great board. I bought 3 of them and I have 6-10 guys that come over 2-3 times a week. Had them for a month now and we have thrown a few hundred games on each one, the boards are holding up great and we have only bounced 1 dart out of the board. It hit the ring on the double bull. Compared to the old boards we would have bounced several dozen darts out already. I am very very happy with these boards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great dartboard for the price
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying that I am a casual dart player. I got this dartboard a couple of months ago and throw darts for about 20 minutes every other day. This is a great dartboard for my purposes. I have not noticed any significant breakdown changes, and the board can be rotated when things do start to breakdown. The metal rack separating the scoring segments is built into the board and is very thin. Bounce outs are very rare. This may be trivial, but the sound of the dart hitting the board is solid and satisfying. I have no complaints, installation was easy, and it looks very sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Overrated.
customer_reviews.text: I am really surprised how little this dartboard heals. Tells me the sissel is not as good as they claim. The reviews are very good, so that is perplexing. I would return it, but missed the return window by a day, though I may pursue the defective avenue. In any event, I wouldn’t recommend this board. Our club uses Unicorn brand and they get a ton of play with little sissel wear. I would buy that brand if I had to do it again.
customer_reviews.author: MPK

customer_reviews.title: Great for a month- Then it’s quickly downhill from there
customer_reviews.text: The set up was straight forward, and was easy to mount to my cabinet. The measuring tape is a nice add-on. This board is not even close to self-healing, and is now starting to let darts fall out in various places. I’ve rotated the numbers on a weekly basis to try and prevent the board from wearing unevenly. After two months of use, a razor wire is no longer straight. I will say I’ve had very few bounce outs. This board was great for about a month, but started showing signs of wear and looseness in the sisal shortly thereafter. It’s just not a very durable board.
customer_reviews.author: Ca Hulse

customer_reviews.title: quality control lacking, very poor choice
customer_reviews.text: Low quality construction. The spider is mounted shallow on some parts and deep on others. The material looks rough and dry rotted in some places, especially the bulls eye. The center ring (in the bulls eye) constantly works itself loose and needs to be tapped back in. The price of this board does not match the overall expectations of quality. I would not buy it again. Update- the spider along the bottom is now seperating and the bristle has deteriorated, especially in the bulls eye. Pics included. Board is 2 years old. Whatever you do, don't buy this dartboard.
customer_reviews.author: Just Brian

customer_reviews.title: Steel tip dartboard
customer_reviews.text: I installed this dartboard in a large frame surrounded by corks. The dartboard stands out on my wall and if anyone misses the dartboard, their darts will hit the corks in the frame rather than the wall.
customer_reviews.author: T. Rourke

customer_reviews.title: Good Board.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good dartboard. It plays well and looks good also. This is not as good as ONE80 Gladiator 2 or 3 and not as good as a Winmau Blade 5 but you are not paying the price of those other boards. If you are looking for a good playable board with thin wires and no bounce outs then I suggest giving this board a try.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Carter

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Sisal does not heal at all. And now after just a few months, I have darts that fall out or do not maintain their old and slip out. Do not recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice board
customer_reviews.text: Nice board with thin wires which results in very few bounce outs. Board was easy to mount and is well made. They say it is self healing, but mine looks like coarse pepper stuck to it. Not sure what they mean by that since I have plenty of holes however it doesn’t affect play at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sawdust46

customer_reviews.title: Nice dartboard; mediocre craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: The metal ring around the sisal is somewhat loose and therefore the edges of the sisal were pretty frayed right out of the box. However, since we're just throwing darts into it, the cosmetic aspect isn't as important. Still would have been nice to have it "perfect".
customer_reviews.author: karibu

customer_reviews.title: Great dartboard!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dartboard for a DIY Father's Day present and it worked out perfectly. This board is good quality and sturdy. It was super easy to attach to the wood board. We have used it numerous times and never had any issues with it. Great price 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Good quality board
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this! Only thing that would make it perfect is changing the style of the numbers. They are hard to read. If the darts aren't sticking well, rub the tips with sand paper and you'll be back in business.
customer_reviews.author: Honest and practical

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: awesome quality board material, the numbers aren't the easiest to read, but that would not deter me from recommending this to anyone. p.s. its heavier than the 10 dollar cheap one i had before (surprise) so if you're like me and upgrading; just be ready to hang it on a stud.
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Nice blades on the board. The cork has a few cracks. Almost looks to be separating around the center. Great board for the price though... We use ours daily... We go through boards ever hear or so, it fits our needs for now
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Not good, I might as well have been throwing at a piece of plywood. When the dart hits the board it's as loud as hitting wood, sent it back for the refund and got the Unicorn eclipse pro, awesome! You could hang it on your bedroom door and not hear it hit. The viper is the worst board I've ever played on!
customer_reviews.author: fun  gardener

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Board seems to play fine despite some defects(see photos) and the holes do seem to heal slowly. Easy to mount and set up. The reason for only 2 stars is there is black on the side of the wire where it should be white, and there a few spot with pits. Thankfully the problems seem to only be cosmetic, but is disappointing for a dart board at this price range.
customer_reviews.author: JMurphy04

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't believe how well this dart board is made ...
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe how well this dart board is made. I ordered this dart board for temporary use while we're waiting for our most expensive board to, and to my surprise?! My roomies and I couldn't believe how well this board is handling the kind of abuse it's getting. It's still looks brand new and very quiet. I, actually we give this board a ten thumbs up....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and seems like it will last for a long time
customer_reviews.text: Travels well, bf travels alot for work and takes it with him from state to state. still holding up and is great quality
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: At least one dart falls out of the board every turn.
customer_reviews.text: The boards look good and appear to be well made, but the quality of the dinner are very poor. Darts fall out of board way too frequently for a new board. I'm ashamed that I recommended these boards to a friend and to a local pub owner. I've played darts for several years, and tried a variety of different brands, but these go on my never again list.
customer_reviews.author: Clem

customer_reviews.title: Razor wire not secured well
customer_reviews.text: With moderate use, the razor wires have begun to pop out after only 4 months. Constantly have to gently beat them back in with a hammer. The sisal on this board isn't nearly as dense as other boards, but that is probably due to the so called playability with soft tip darts... Which won't really stick anyways. Decent board for the price and light play though. Best for steels.
customer_reviews.author: Mat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for teens
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my teens. They have enjoyed playing it pretty much everyday since it was delivered during the COVID19 quarantine.
customer_reviews.author: 2BoysMAMA

customer_reviews.title: Makes you feel pro
customer_reviews.text: Love this dart board. My buddies and have used it regularly for months with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Null Hypothesis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Board has worked very well so far. Looks good. Only real issue is the border metal is a little soft. Especially in the border rings for the bull. Dart will hit the border and instead of deflecting into the board, they dig into the soft metal and then bounce back. Then there is some damage to the borders and the thinner boarders outside the bull occasionally end up severed.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Nice Board, Just Not a Tournament Board
customer_reviews.text: Not bad on the price, just doesn’t hold darts well unless they are thrown fairly hard. It looks like the fiber material is not very dense, thus allowing the darts to drop and fall out. I have a another “tournament” board with razor wire and have practically no issues with darts falling out. Same darts used on both boards (decent mid-range darts, 21g).
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY THIS POS HORRIBLE PRODUCT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: WHAT THE HELL IS THIS ? BOARD CAME AND LITERALLY GOT CRACKS ALL THROUGHOUT THE WHOLE DAMN BOARD DART LITERALLY JUST GLIDES RIGHT THROUGH THE CRACKS. TERRIBLE PRODUCT FOR $40!!! GOING WITH UNICORN ECLIPSE PRO OR A WINMAU BLADE 5 FOR $20 MORE THIS IS A HORRIBLE DART BOARD NOT WORTH IT AT ALL!!!
customer_reviews.author: Henry Robert K Correa-Young

customer_reviews.title: Stand Up
customer_reviews.text: Why did I buy this? My Apple watch kept telling me to standup and the wife wouldn’t buy into a pool table taking over the livingroom so.....but really, it’s a great getter upper. A triple triple 20 still eludes me but I’m getting there.
customer_reviews.author: dmoskaly

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: When my dartboard arrived it looked like something liquid had been dropped on it the white on the board 14 - 18. Is a dirty white the black is very dull an you can see cracks throughout the board. Two weeks prior to getting this board I recieved one for my boyfriend birthday an was very pleased with it but mine looked like someone drug it down the road
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good board
customer_reviews.text: Good board for the money. The wires do get pretty banged up and your darts might start bouncing out.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great Dartboard
customer_reviews.text: Everything it was supposed to be. I like the ability to move the numbers around.
customer_reviews.author: D. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, only complaint.. the metals numbers are hard to read when aiming.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and durable. Makes a great dartboard for the price. It's easy to use and after several uses it hasn't swelled. We keep ours in the garage in very humid weather too.
customer_reviews.author: Stdcam13

customer_reviews.title: Ordered Viper 'Razorback' dartboard - Received cheaper Viper 'Shot King' dartboard instead?!
customer_reviews.text: Waited over a week for Viper 'Razorback' dartboard to arrive. Upon opening package, found really worn 'Razorback' packaging that contained a cheaper version of Viper dartboard (Viper 'Shot King'). Not happy about needing to go through hassle of returning, reordering, and waiting again :(
customer_reviews.author: Stanwood360

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to drunk chicks throwing darts
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for those drunkin late night parties only had one incident (no need to elaborate)
customer_reviews.author: James Soriano

customer_reviews.title: My old board w/staples would bounce out on a VERY ...
customer_reviews.text: My old board w/staples would bounce out on a VERY regular basis, so much so that we could not play darts with the dogs in the same room for fear of a bounced dart catching them. This board is a pleasure to play on. Have now thrown several hundred darts without a single bounce out. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: wander_indiana

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend this board!
customer_reviews.text: Great board arrived quickly! Nice and thick, the metal spacers between the numbers is thin and deep and doesn't stick out and cannot be hit with the dart as easily. The darts sink in quietly. Thank you! Recommended ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Chantelle Cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: Nice dart board.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent dart board. Hard to see the numbers. If they were painted white I'd give it 5 stars. I will paint them myself.
customer_reviews.author: RonH

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first, however I was very surprised at the performance and I would recommend it to anyone who is interested in a perfect dart board
customer_reviews.author: Brad Gronnel

customer_reviews.title: Nice board
customer_reviews.text: This board is good for the money it's great to have a steel tip board to get some accuracy on smaller targets than the soft tip boards
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: How did we ever have patio fun without this dart board? It is great quality.
customer_reviews.author: NTX Mom

customer_reviews.title: This is the board for you!
customer_reviews.text: Virtually no bounce-outs! You're more likely to bounce off another dart than a wire. That was my main concern when looking for a board. I would have been disappointed with a lesser board. Don't cheap out-you'll be sorry if you do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME BOARD! Good quality and a nice addition to my game room
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The board is holding up well and is a great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have had the Viper Razorback for a month now. The board is holding up well and is a great value for the money. There are no bounceouts with this board! I would highly recommend this dartboard. I received the package early which is great but the only thing is the dartboard box was in another big box with very little paper inside for packing material. I think this may have lead to the double bullseye ring being slightly warped because the steel blade divider looks bent also.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Austin Howell

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This is a phenomenal board for the price. Completely staple free, not just a staple free bullseye. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sk123

customer_reviews.title: Right on Target!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, but remove your darts right away - if you want it to "heal".
customer_reviews.author: LarannDesigns

customer_reviews.title: Save money buy Walmarts
customer_reviews.text: This is the replacement board they sent me. The first board was as hard as cement and you could not stick the darts into it. Viper has always been a respected name.in the industry. I can get a better quality board from Walmart. What happened to taking pride in your products
customer_reviews.author: Barbaraann Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Thin wires
customer_reviews.text: The smaller wires make it better with less bounce outs.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Horne

customer_reviews.title: Really nice dartboard
customer_reviews.text: Color is great and the quality is way better than I would have expected
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: Works great, no issues. The numbers are slightly hard to read, but beyond that I have no complaints. The price point for this level of quality is great
customer_reviews.author: Pase

customer_reviews.title: Product came damaged and I hate the headache of returning items
customer_reviews.text: Product came damaged and I hate the headache of returning items. Other than it being broken seems like a decent quality board so I'll give 2 stars for effort. If the board wasn't broken I would probably be able to give it 5 stars. You get what you pay for and if it wasn't broken I wpild say it's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great dartboard
customer_reviews.text: I have now purchased three of the dartboards (we play A LOT of darts). They generally last for about eight to ten months for us which is a lot longer than most other boards that I have purchased in the past. More than likely, this will be the only board I will purchase from now on. My husband and I have been using a back up that was just awful compared to this one. The darts were constantly hitting the metal frame and bouncing off. The metal on the Viper board is more flush and have fewer reflects. Overall, I've purchased probably about 10 different brands of dartboards, but consistently come back to this one. Just a great dartboard!
customer_reviews.author: A. Litton

customer_reviews.title: Smooth as butter
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Dart Board. I have had three boards and this one is the best in all ways possible.
customer_reviews.author: californiajoellc

customer_reviews.title: Greatly reduced bounce outs
customer_reviews.text: Great board. No more bounce outs even better than advertised
customer_reviews.author: frederic c nadeau

customer_reviews.title: Looks to me like it will handle another 50
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how long boards should last, but I just hit 50,000 plus yesterday. Looks to me like it will handle another 50,000 at least. I am using 21gm darts and rotate my board regularly. I think this is an excellent board for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia I.

customer_reviews.title: No bounce outs so far!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this board for 11 days. Thrown at least 1,500 darts into it. Haven't had a bounce out. Incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Opinions

customer_reviews.title: Great dart board
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you can't beat a razor edge board like this. We have essentially eliminated bounce outs caused by the staples of my previous board. The material is strong and durable and holes don't stay as long as they do in the cork board that I own now.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Hollowed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome board. Our first. Somewhat heavy but if you find the stud in your wall...it's solid.
customer_reviews.author: B's Dad

customer_reviews.title: Very good board for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good board...good for home to practice on but I would find another board to use for league or tournament play.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality staple free board
customer_reviews.text: Quality board, I really like the thin separation wire without staples. Have not thrown on it yet, but as soon as my "Man Cave" garage is done, we will see how well it heals from the darts.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: this was a gift
customer_reviews.text: When I unwrapped this dartboard from its packaging, I felt that it was well made and of professional quality.It was a gift to a college student along with the red backboard. He was very pleased when he saw the dartboard.
customer_reviews.author: P. Pellerin

customer_reviews.title: Hang it up and start practicing
customer_reviews.text: Nice board, better than most bars have. For a small time shooter it will do everything you need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Evan S.

customer_reviews.title: Dart holes did not "heal".
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in the quality of the board. The dart holes did not "heal". The board looked very used after only a week.
customer_reviews.author: JJD

customer_reviews.title: Nice board
customer_reviews.text: It's a great board. I am super happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Mcnamee

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. We used it while deployed. Great gift. Sturdy and of great quality. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda M

customer_reviews.title: The board arrived on time and I was surprised at ...
customer_reviews.text: The board arrived on time and I was surprised at the quality of the board. It should last forever. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M Wood

customer_reviews.title: viper similar quality as Winmau half the cost
customer_reviews.text: This $50 dart board is just as good as a similar one by Winmau for $100! If you haven't jumped on the Viper dart line I suggest you do so!! Self health ng Staple free is only way to go!
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Addition to Game Room
customer_reviews.text: Looks good hanging in our enclosed back porch, and the holes heal after removing darts. This bad shot can't say the same for the wood wall surrounding same.
customer_reviews.author: Pat E

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and it was exactly what I was looking for. It was regulation size and the thin wires make it easier for the darts to go in when they are close to the borders of the numbers. I think this was a great buy and will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Grace F.

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Have used regularly for a few months ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Have used regularly for a few months now, not a single dart has bounced out. Fits perfectly in the viper metropolitain cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice board, love it. And love no staples around the bull!
customer_reviews.author: Newmanlink

customer_reviews.title: Excellant
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what he wanted and was good time frame to receive.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Coughenour

customer_reviews.title: damaged
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box and the dart board is damaged as you can see in the picture
customer_reviews.author: jeremy taisague

customer_reviews.title: Best value in a dartboard!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously this is a great board. For the price, you cannot buy a better board. The fibers are solid and the wiring ring is thin to prevent bounce outs. I've played daily for a month and not one bounce out. Viper is a solid brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jon N

customer_reviews.title: Not self healing
customer_reviews.text: This is nice board but it's not very self healing. There are holes left in the board after shooting.
customer_reviews.author: ben l.

customer_reviews.title: Now It's more Fun to Throw them Darts!
customer_reviews.text: Glad I Spent the Bigger Coin To Get This Sisal Fiber Board. Now It's more Fun to Throw them Darts!
customer_reviews.author: ssands1

customer_reviews.title: A very buy
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to read the numbers on the broad.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing dartboard. I have no complaints. It’s a very good quality dartboard. I truly recommend this dartboard.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN J PLATZ

customer_reviews.title: Still new but this really seems quality I gave it ...
customer_reviews.text: Still new but this really seems quality I gave it as a gift to my boyfriend and he and his friends can't get enough. They play for a few hours every week.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Maiden

customer_reviews.title: Nice board for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice board for the price, needed something less expensive for a board at work, this fits the bill nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Roseman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Dartboard for Serious Players
customer_reviews.text: Excellent dartboard for amateurs and semi-professionals. Very few bounce-outs, if any. The wires are razor-thin. This model is professionally made, with great color contrast, beautiful design, and study material. My darts land spot on and stick well to the board. I recommend this board for use at home or at the bar. Make sure to get the viper surround/wall protection just in case your dart aim is too high/low.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Shafi

customer_reviews.title: Great Board
customer_reviews.text: This product is true to its description. It has taken many pokes, yet it still looks like it did the day I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Great Dartboard!
customer_reviews.text: Came with mounting hardware, good quality sisal too! Works great!
customer_reviews.author: BCombs08

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Board
customer_reviews.text: Great DARTBOARD. THrown THOUSANDS OF DARTS. No wear onthe the board so far. red backboard compliments the dart board perfectly
customer_reviews.author: shelby Liddell

customer_reviews.title: Board works great for my game room
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected. Board works great for my game room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good board for low price.
customer_reviews.text: I have been playing over 20 years and this is a good quality board for a low price. Its staple free and and has razor thin wires for no bounce outs.
customer_reviews.author: SHANE A HILKER

customer_reviews.title: A Great Steel-Tip Dartboard for All Level Players
customer_reviews.text: I've been playing Steel-Tip Darts for about 25 years. I've purchased a few Steel-Tip Boards over the years. I would consider this Steel Tip Board to be a very good Dart Board for any level player. Doesn't matter if it's you are just starting out or you are a professional, this board will not disappoint. Enjoy :)
customer_reviews.author: Expert Computer Help

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality dart board. It does not include darts.
customer_reviews.author: Nick K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price! I just don't like how the numbers are hard to read.
customer_reviews.author: Fwanki

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this board since December, almost daily...works fine.
customer_reviews.author: alivia matz

customer_reviews.title: To the point!
customer_reviews.text: very nice board - the imbedded rings make a difference - very tight board...
customer_reviews.author: Beth Beran

customer_reviews.title: I like the wire separators no staples
customer_reviews.text: I like the wire separators no staples , but the board itself is sub par it's not self healing like the other bristle boards . It's ok but I'm not very happy
customer_reviews.author: the guy who bought the case

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The darts stick well, but the numbers just don't seem right.
customer_reviews.author: Bookmark

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Very solid, well put together board that seems to fit and work very well so far. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: KidNicholas32

customer_reviews.title: High quality parts thrown together.
customer_reviews.text: This board is made up of high quality pieces, which is unfortunate because overall the board is low quality. The fit and finish of wires, paint, and board surface is ultimately what gave it 2 stars. Not self healing as well as other Sisal boards I have played; DMI, Winmau, Unicorn. Very uneven scoring surface, some wires are buried where as some protrude close to 1/16 of an inch. Paint bleed over on several doubles and triples.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Lessar

customer_reviews.title: ... a little off but i wouldn't say its that bad but im just upset when it was missing the ...
customer_reviews.text: the bull's eye was a little off but i wouldn't say its that bad but im just upset when it was missing the brackets so i just went ahead and bought some since i really couldn't wait for new ones
customer_reviews.author: braxton

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This dartboard is excellent quality. I replaced an old paper board that was in my garage when I purchased it and couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Cale Z.

product_meta.title: Viper Razorback Official Competition Bristle Steel Tip Dartboard Set with Staple-Free Razor Thin Metal Spider Wire for Increased Scoring, Reduced Bounce Outs; Self-Healing Premium-Grade Sisal Board
product_meta.description: The Viper Razorback is a 100% staple-free spider dartboard constructed from self-healing sisal bristle fibers compressed together, providing unsurpassed durability. Utilizing razor thin galvanized wires, the surface area is greatly increased which helps prevent bounce-outs. The Viper Razorback is an official tournament size board, measuring 18" in diameter and 1.5" D. A movable number ring further extends the dartboard's life. This dartboard accommodates both steel tip and soft tip darts and includes mounting hardware.
feature_bullets: Constructed from self-healing sisal bristle fibers compressed together, providing unsurpassed durability
Staple-free spider utilizes razor thin galvanized wires which greatly increases the surface area, helping prevent bounce-outs
Viper Razorback is an official tournament size board, measuring 18" in diameter and 1.5" D
A movable number ring further extends the dartboard's life
Dartboard accommodates both steel tip and soft tip darts and includes mounting hardware

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
